tool_description: Versatile Website Analysis API capable of comprehensively analyzing and handling various aspects related to websites.
name: Website Oracle
title: Website Oracle

api_list.name: getContent
api_list.description: Get the content of a website for analyzing
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://website-oracle.p.rapidapi.com/content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-oracle.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getDependencies
api_list.description: Get the dependency links of a website for ensuring that none of the URLs are broken
